Notes: Master/slave negotiation (29 = internal clock, 55 = external clock)
Master selects music type. 1C = A-type music
Players select difficulty. Both start at 0
Master sends initial garbage (10 rows x 10 cols)
8x = Solid space (x is the tile, ranges from 0-7 inclusive)
Master sends game pieces (buffer of 256 which loops during gameplay)
This byte and the next 4 signal the end of pieces / start of game
Master triggers end screen with Mario and Luigi
Master presses start to start a new round
This byte and the next 3 signal the end of pieces / start of game
Master sends initial garbage (10 rows x 10 cols)
